header.postText: A parody of Jimmy Kimmel's Mean Tweets.  Instead of troll's tweets we've gathered wisdom from leaders and great thinkers; instead of targeting celebrities our quotes address 50% of the population.  Created by Hayley Kimmel and Hot Buffet. Featuring the women of sketch comedy group Hot Buffet: Ying Ying Li, Sarah Hartman, Jessica Park, and Lindsay Perry. Photography by David Park. Directed, produced and edited by Jessica Park. www.hotbuffetsketchcomedy.com @hotbuffet1. Hot Buffet is Sarah Hartman, Ying Ying Li, Tim McKiernan, Jessica Park, Lindsay Perry, and Mick Spence.
